message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair considering the inflation.
I think 55/45 is more reasonable considering I'm losing value each round.
Bob, my turn to propose a 55/45 split.  You're right about the inflation working against you, but remember this is your last chance to make a deal before the value drops again!
I'll take a bit more to compensate for the lost value. This is my best offer.
Bob, the clock is ticking and that money is losing value fast.  52/48 is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
